post.title: att iphone plan unlimited data w/200 free minutes+corporate discount
post.content: hi! i am looking to transfer ownership of my att contract. the contract expires in september of 2011 with a full discount on a qualifying phone in february. my account is in good standing and includes a 450 minute voice plan with 200 bonus minutes for free (650 minutes total) and the iphone unlimited data package. in addition, there are over 2000 rollover minutes! currently, there is a 15% corporate discount which may transfer. i am also looking to sell a 32gb iphone 3gs with my plan. if you are interested, send me a pm or post back. thanks!
